member.name: MFVideoDRMFlags
member.summary: Specifies the type of copy protection required for a video stream.

member.name: MFVideoDRMFlags.MFVideoDRMFlag_AnalogProtected
member.summary: Analog copy protection should be applied.

member.name: MFVideoDRMFlags.MFVideoDRMFlag_DigitallyProtected
member.summary: Digital copy protection should be applied.
